trans-unit.source: Determines whether a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> is placed in the overflow <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: Determina se um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> é colocado no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> de estouro.

trans-unit.source: If there are more overflow items than can be displayed on the form, use the [ToolStrip Items Collection Editor](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e681f3ab-94ba-4b2b-ac64-1dfad46caa25) to manage this situation.
trans-unit.target: Se houver mais itens de estouro que podem ser exibidas no formulário, use o [Editor de coleção de itens de ToolStrip](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e681f3ab-94ba-4b2b-ac64-1dfad46caa25) para gerenciar essa situação.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> is permanently shown in the overflow <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> é mostrado permanentemente no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> de estouro.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> drifts between the main <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> and the overflow <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> as required if space is not available on the main <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> é dessincronizado entre o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> principal e o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> de estouro conforme necessário, se não há espaço disponível no principal <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> is never a candidate for the overflow <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> nunca é um candidato para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> de estouro.

trans-unit.source: If the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> cannot fit on the main <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />, it will not be shown.
trans-unit.target: Se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> não puder ser ajustado ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> principal, ele não será mostrado.
